mapper.select: SELECT tm.tankID , tm.tankName , tc.tankType, b.branchName, tm.tankStatus, e.name FROM tankManagement tm ,inCharge ic ,branch b, tankCategory tc, employee e WHERE ic.category = 'tank' and ic.employeeID = e.employeeID and tm.tankID = ic.idx and tm.categoryID = tc.categoryID and tm.branchID = b.branchID GROUP BY tankID ORDER BY tankID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO managementItemsTable (tankID, area, flooring, filter, mercury, waterLevel, salinity, pH, dO, nitrates, nitrites, ammonia, phosphates) VALUES (#{tankID}, #{area}, #{flooringNo}, #{filterType}, #{mercury}, #{waterLevel}, #{salinity}, #{pH}, #{dO}, #{nitrates}, #{nitrites}, #{ammonia}, #{phosphates})
INSERT INTO inCharge (employeeID, category, idx) VALUES (#{employeeID}, 'tank', #{tankID})
mapper.select: SELECT mit.*, tm.* FROM managementItemsTable mit, tankManagement tm WHERE mit.tankID = #{param1} AND tm.tankID = #{param1}
